DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether adipose-derived stem cell therapy effective treatment facial rejuvenation .
DOC.brief_title: The Clinical Application Adipose-Derived Stem Cells Facial Rejuvenation
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective study patient undergo adipose-derived stem cell therapy facial rejuvenation hospital Xuzhou medical university . The therapy involve injection patient 's adipose-derived stem cell , separate vacuumed fat obtain liposuction abdomen , hip , thigh . It confirm adipose-derived stem cell induced differentiation fat cell , osteoblast , chondrocytes , muscle cell , endothelial cell correspond condition current literature . The therapy evolve less invasive technique facial rejuvenation compare traditional techniquesï¼Œsuch fat cell injection , sodium hyaluronate injection . Through use pre post treatment photo , three-dimensional skin CT , addition therapeutic evaluation , patient satisfaction questionnaire clinician assessment , hope investigator confirm rejuvenate capability adipose-derived stem cell therapy .
DOC.criteria: Males female Ages1860 Patients racial ethnic origin Patients undergo facial rejuvenation Ages 18 , 60 Female patient pregnancy menstrual period Patients undergoing facial rejuvenation use method include botox injection , chemical peel , face lifts others Patients use blood thinner , aspirin hormone , stop Patients suffer severe organic disease , coronary heart disease , hypertension , diabetes , lung dysfunction Patients suffer mental disease , acute chronic infectious disease
